design_philosophy.vibe: Precision, Authority, Proactive Intelligence. Not just a dashboard, but a decision engine.
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Hybrid Swiss-Tech: Stark White data surfaces + Deep Obsidian sidebar. High contrast for readability, electric accents for AI actions.

typography.installation_instructions: Add to index.css via @import or HTML head: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@300;400;700;900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Public+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600&display=swap

usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo Black (900) for major stats, Light (300) for section titles. Tracking-tight.
usage_rules.body: Public Sans for all UI text. Tracking-normal.
usage_rules.numbers: JetBrains Mono for ALL monetary values (CLV, MRR), percentages, and risk scores. Tabular nums are mandatory.

colors.rules: No generic gradients. Use flat colors for data. Use the 'ai_glow' ONLY for the GPT-5.2 recommendation button and active prediction states.

cards.style: Sharp corners or sm radius (rounded-sm). Border: 1px solid #E5E7EB. Shadow: none. Hover: border-accent/50 transition-colors.
cards.header_rule: Card headers must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest, text-muted-foreground.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ai_action: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')], bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-600 to-indigo-600 text-white shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 hover:shadow-indigo-500/40

charts.styling: Minimalist. No grid lines (or very subtle). Tooltips must be dark mode (bg-gray-900 text-white).

images.usage: Top left of sidebar. Mix-blend-mode: normal.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down 0.95 on click. Cards lift -2px on hover.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid whites and grays.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Do NOT center align the app container.
For the AI Recommendation section, use a 'magic' border effect or subtle glow to distinguish it from standard data.
Ensure high contrast for all text (WCAG AA).

page_specifics.dashboard: Bento Grid layout. KPIs at top. Churn Risk map in center. Recent activity list on right.
page_specifics.customer_analysis: Split view: Left profile (sticky), Right detailed history/charts.
page_specifics.predictions: Form-based input with instant result visualization. Use a 'Confidence Gauge' for the prediction score.
